domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
This is your daily reminder that it took Barack Obama until October of 2009 to declare Swine Flu a National Emergency

It began in April of ‘09 but Obama waited until 20,000 people in the US had been hospitalized & 1,000+ had died

Where was the media hysteria then?

🤔
